LanguageData.RTN_Translation_CommandTransformDesc: Transforms the user into their Goddess form providing a buff to the pawn at the cost of Faith.
LanguageData.RTN_Translation_HasFaithPedestal: Can only have a single Faith Pedestal.
LanguageData.RTN_Translation_PlaceFaithPedestalNorth: Must place north of the Faith Pedestal.
LanguageData.RTN_Translation_PlaceFaithPedestalSouth: Must place south of the Faith Pedestal.
LanguageData.RTN_Translation_FaithLinkFormedLetter: {name} has created a powerful bond with {animalName}, creating a Faith Link between them. This Faith Link grants {animalName} strength beyond what is normally possible.
LanguageData.RTN_Translation_HandmaidenPromotion: Due to the unavailability of the Goddess, {name} has been promoted to a Goddess to take their place.
LanguageData.RTN_Translation_FaithPedestalWarning:
Warning!
Creating a Faith Pedestal can may be seen as an act of aggresion and/or heresy be some.
LanguageData.RTN_Translation_HostileReligion: Creating Goddess in defiance of their religion.
LanguageData.RTN_Translation_HostilePower: Created a Goddess that is a threat to the throne. Those that challenge the Emperor must be destroyed.
